about_the_game:
63 page PDF which contains artwork featured in the game, as well as artist and author commentary. As an added bonus, this DLC also includes an ending guide as well as a 5 page comic.

This PDF contains adult imagery that is also featured in the base game.

To access this PDF after purchasing, hover over "Tomai" in your game library, right click and hover over "manage" then select "browse local files" from there you should see a PDF document labeled "Tomai PDF Steam", enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of oral sex, mutual masturbation, tentacle sex, and polyamorous relationships. Absolutely everything is consensual, and there is no violence whatsoever in this game.
